title: Tom.Clancys.Ghost.Recon.Future.Soldier.v1.2.Update-SKIDROW
description:
S  K  I  D  R  O  W
.the leading force.

proudly presents
Tom Clancys Ghost Recon Future Soldier - v1.2 Update (c) Ubisoft

28-06-2012....Release Date <-> Protection.............Ubisoft DRM
FPS..............Game Type <-> Disk(s)........................DOX

RELEASE NOTES

Patch 1.2 Changes

Improved stability in online multiplayer matches.
Improved voice chat quality for PCs running Windows Vista.
Improved navigation through gameÃ‚â€™s menus.
Introduced 6-man party system in the multiplayer game mode.
Balanced several weapons (assault rifles, SMSGs, handguns, shotguns)
Balanced equipment (grenades, flash bang, EMP, stun guns, number of
drones in match).
Adjusted aim sensitivity and quick scope.
Fixed map exploits
Adjusted melee.
Adjusted XP values.
Several technical / network improvements.

INSTALL NOTES

1. Run GRFS_1.2.exe and install
2. Copy everything from the SKIDROW folder into the game installation
3. Start game and you will be presented with the Ubisoft login screen
Username is of course SKIDROW, leave it like that
Type anything as password, just make sure its atleast 6-8 characters
long and put a mark in "remember me"
4. Hit the Play button!
5. Play the game
6. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!

**NOTE**
Make sure all Game and Ubisoft Launcher processes are blocked on
firewall.

GREETINGS

To all friends of the family and honorable rival groups!
